abstract: The name of the output from a feature extraction layer within the model.
overview:
## Discussion

When training an image classifier with a custom feature extractor, use [doc://com.apple.createml/documentation/CreateML/MLImageClassifier/CustomFeatureExtractor/outputName] to select a layer within the model that has an output of [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/CoreML/MLMultiArray].

Set [doc://com.apple.createml/documentation/CreateML/MLImageClassifier/CustomFeatureExtractor/outputName] to `nil` if the model (specified by [doc://com.apple.createml/documentation/CreateML/MLImageClassifier/CustomFeatureExtractor/modelPath]) has only one output of type [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/CoreML/MLMultiArray].

# outputName

**Instance Property**

The name of the output from a feature extraction layer within the model.

## Declaration

```swift
var outputName: String?
```

## Discussion

When training an image classifier with a custom feature extractor, use [doc://com.apple.createml/documentation/CreateML/MLImageClassifier/CustomFeatureExtractor/outputName] to select a layer within the model that has an output of [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/CoreML/MLMultiArray].

Set [doc://com.apple.createml/documentation/CreateML/MLImageClassifier/CustomFeatureExtractor/outputName] to `nil` if the model (specified by [doc://com.apple.createml/documentation/CreateML/MLImageClassifier/CustomFeatureExtractor/modelPath]) has only one output of type [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/CoreML/MLMultiArray].

## Configuring a custom feature extractor

- **modelPath**: The location of a neural network `.mlmodel` file that takes an image as an input.
